spec_data.Name: perl-Email-Template
spec_data.Description:
This is a fairly simple interface to generate "multipart/alternative"
e-mails with both "text/html" and "text/plain" components using a single
HTML based Template Toolkit template.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:16:36 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Send "multipart/alternative" (text & html) e-mail from a Template
